languages.text: {n}Ваши слова разлетаются в абсолютной тишине, взрывающейся спустя мгновение. Изголодавшиеся бедняки со слезами на глазах принимаются возносить молитвы вам и Ему.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова разлетаются в абсолютной тишине, взрывающейся спустя мгновение. Изголодавшиеся бедняки со слезами на глазах принимаются возносить молитвы вам и Ему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which explodes only a moment later as the starving poor break into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which explodes only a moment later as the starving poor break into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
{n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tus palabras resuenan en el silencio absoluto, que solo dura un instante antes de que los pobres hambrientos estallen en oraciones dedicadas a ti y a Él, con lágrimas brillando en sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus palabras resuenan en el silencio absoluto, que solo dura un instante antes de que los pobres hambrientos estallen en oraciones dedicadas a ti y a Él, con lágrimas brillando en sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉が完全な静寂の中に響く。それは飢えた貧しい人々が、目に涙を光らせてあなたと主に祈りを捧げ始めるまでのほんの一瞬だけのことだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉が完全な静寂の中に響く。それは飢えた貧しい人々が、目に涙を光らせてあなたと主に祈りを捧げ始めるまでのほんの一瞬だけのことだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的话语在一片死寂中回响。寂静只持续了片刻，随后饥饿的穷人便开始向你和神皇祈祷，所有人眼中都噙着泪水。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的话语在一片死寂中回响。寂静只持续了片刻，随后饥饿的穷人便开始向你和神皇祈祷，所有人眼中都噙着泪水。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Wort hallen in absoluter Stille wider, die aber nur einen Moment anhält, denn dann beginnen die hungernden Armen, mit Tränen in den Augen zu dir und Ihm zu beten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Wort hallen in absoluter Stille wider, die aber nur einen Moment anhält, denn dann beginnen die hungernden Armen, mit Tränen in den Augen zu dir und Ihm zu beten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles résonnent dans un silence absolu. Un instant plus tard, la foule semble comme éclater ; de toutes parts vous parviennent des prières adressées aussi bien à vous qu'à Sa gloire, certains allant même jusqu'à verser quelques larmes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles résonnent dans un silence absolu. Un instant plus tard, la foule semble comme éclater ; de toutes parts vous parviennent des prières adressées aussi bien à vous qu'à Sa gloire, certains allant même jusqu'à verser quelques larmes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sözlerin, yalnızca kısa bir süre devam eden mutlak bir sessizlikte yankılanıyor. Ardından açlıktan midesi kazınan insanlar, gözlerindeki yaşların parıltısıyla birlikte sana ve İmparator'a dualar yağdırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words echo in absolute silence, which lasts only a moment before the starving poor erupt into prayers to you and to Him, tears glistening in their eyes.{/n}
